Configuration.startupLisp:

;; just testing connections (progn ;; (setj WorldObjects:MaintainEffects false) ;; (setj WorldObjects:MaintainActions false) ;; (setj WorldObjects:MaintainAnims false) ;; (setj WorldObjects:GleanAssetsFromFolders false) (setj WorldObjects:MaintainGroupMetaData false) ;;(setj WorldObjects:MaintainObjectUpdates false) ;; (setj WorldObjects:MaintainSimObjectInfoMap false) (setj WorldObjects:SendSimObjectInfoMap false) (setj WorldObjects:SendOnDataAspectUpdate false) )
(setj GridAddress "https://login.agni.lindenlab.com/cgi-bin/login.cgi") (setj GridAddress "http://login.osgrid.org/") (setj GridAddress "OSGrid") ;; .. depends on grid.xml (setj GridAddress "agni") ;; .. depends on grid.xml
(setj GlobalPasswd "060788")

(setj StartLoc "uri:last&173&51&38") (setj StartLoc "uri:Isabel&44&107&58") (setj StartLoc "uri:Fairyverse&115&125&21") (setj StartLoc "uri:Boardroom&128&125&29") (setj StartLoc "uri:MilSpecMoo&128&128&32")
'(setj StartLoc "uri:MilSpecMoo&72&135&38") '(setj StartLoc "uri:Diva Texture test&128&128&38") (setj StartLoc "uri:Wright Plaza&128&128&38") (setj StartLoc "uri:LBSA Plaza&128&128&38") (setj StartLoc "last") (setj StartLoc "Halca/128/128/38") (setj StartLoc "Ahern/2/3/40") (setj StartLoc "Penn State Isle 2/49/127/25") (setj StartLoc "MASA Group/115/156/50") (setj StartLoc "Belphegor/154/41/63") '(setj StartLoc "last")
'(create-botclient "Nephrael" "Rae" GlobalPasswd "https://login.agni.lindenlab.com/cgi-bin/login.cgi" "uri:Fairyverse&115&125&21") '(create-botclient "Douglas" "Miles" GlobalPasswd GridAddress StartLoc) '(create-botclient "Nephrael" "Rae" GlobalPasswd GridAddress StartLoc ) '(create-botclient "Lisa" "Wooley" GlobalPasswd GridAddress StartLoc ) '(create-botclient "Cat" "Bot" GlobalPasswd GridAddress StartLoc ) '(create-botclient "Nephrael" "Rajesh" GlobalPasswd GridAddress StartLoc) '(create-botclient "Nephrael" "Rae" GlobalPasswd GridAddress StartLoc) '(create-botclient "BinaBot" "Daxeline" GlobalPasswd GridAddress StartLoc) (create-botclient "bungiecord" "Burnstein" GlobalPasswd GridAddress StartLoc)
Configuration.startupClientLisp:
(setj Full (== 1 1))
(thisClient.ExecuteCommand "debug Debug") (thisClient.ExecuteCommand "load CogbotRadegastPluginModule") '(thisClient.ExecuteCommand "load IrcRegionModule") '(thisClient.ExecuteCommand "thread irc #logicmoo-cogbot cogbot_ irc.freenode.net") ;; to connect to IRC
;; (thisClient.ExecuteCommand "showgui tray") ;; minimize radegast to tray - not good on mono becasue the hwnd not created
(if Full (progn ;; (thisClient.ExecuteCommand "load AIMLBotModule.dll block") ;; (thisClient.ExecuteCommand "aiml @off") ;; makes the AIMLBotModule complete loading before moving on ))
(if Full (progn ;; (thisClient.ExecuteCommand "load CycWorldModule") (thisClient.ExecuteCommand "load TheSimiansModule") ;; (thisClient.ExecuteCommand "/load PrologBotModule.dll") ))
;;(thisClient.ExecuteCommand "waitforlogin 120") ;; give user/system a chance to login before the script starts it
(thisClient.ExecuteCommand "debug Debug")
;; log into Secondlife (if Full (progn (thisClient.ExecuteCommand "login") ;; does the login if the user didnt press the button (thisClient.ExecuteCommand "waitforlogin 300") ;; wait for the auto-login (5 minutes) ))
Configuration.onLogin:
(thisClient.ExecuteCommand "waitforlogin 10") ;; makes sure we are really ready! ;; (thisClient.ExecuteCommand "teleport MilSpecMoo/128/128/31") ;; TP home ;;(thisClient.ExecuteCommand (@"teleport {0}" StartLoc)) ;; TP To StartLocation
(thisClient.ExecuteCommand "setmaster Annie Obscure") ;; change this to your name on AGNI ;;(thisClient.ExecuteCommand "setmaster Annie Obscure") ;; change this to your name on OpenSim
;; (thisClient.ExecuteCommand "aiml @on") ;; turns on/off aiml for all users (thisClient.ExecuteCommand "appearance nobake") ;;(setj WorldObjectsForAimLBot:DefaultMaxRespondToChatPerMinute 20) ;; once every three seconds ;;(thisClient.ExecuteCommand "simbot start") ;; turns on/off Simian module thinker ;;(thisClient.ExecuteCommand "appearance bake") ;; set bakes ;; (thisClient.ExecuteCommand "say I am logged in now!") ;; ;;(thisClient.ExecuteCommand "Follow* Douglas Miles") ;; (thisClient.ExecuteCommand "Follow* $master")
(thisClient.ExecuteCommand "debug Info")
